amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to reduce funding for the Global Environment Facility by $139,575,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Global Environment Facility by $139,575,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 227 (Roll no. 298).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 227 (Roll no. 298).
